Updates the hit counters for the players and all of the enemies within range of the players.

updateWeaponMenu(int[]) - Method in class src.gui.GameFrame

Checks to see what type is selected in the land type submenu and sets components based on that choice.

updateWindowBasedOnMainSelection() - Method in class src.gui.editor.EditorControlFrame
Checks to see what type is selected in the main type selector and makes components visible/invisible based on that choice.
